extendedInfo.description: Crazy Girl Driving is the best "Girl Driving Games" for Android.Help Natasha to drive and blast of all the vehicles on the road to get her money for shopping. Who knows even she can take you out for dinner!!!We all know that girls are not a good drivers. So this is the golden chance for you to show your driving capability and impress Natasha. Blast of all vehicles using the missile and impress the sexy girl Natasha. How to Play- Tilt left to move left- Tilt right to move right- Collect Missiles- Touch screen to shoot/release the missile- Shoot or dash away the cars from the road- Car is loaded with unlimited missiles ( Kind of James Bond Car )tags: natasha, girl driving games, car driving games, learn car driving, impress girls, shoot, missiles, car games, road warriors, road rash, crazy grandpa, angry grannyPLEASE NOTE THAT:In real world you should not try either of the following:listen to girlsMotor bike stuntsDirt and drag racingtaking part in a death race rallystreet racingdemo rash kind of activitiesNote: To keep the app free and for the effort we put in the app. The app uses push and icon ads for monetization. Thanks for your support. You can opt-out of these anytime using the opt out link provided in the app.Our game also has EULA license at the beginning of the game for you to accept or close on push notification and icon ads.
